title: Various Forum Ranks?
body:
Hey there, 

Just wondering, what are the various forum ranks and badges that people have, and is there any place where I can see a table or information about them?

Thanks.

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any sources archiving what boards badges can be obtained. Did you have any specific questions about them that I could answer for you?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GUN5kNJp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-04T20:50:16.386+0000)
>
> I wasn't able to find any sources archiving what boards badges can be obtained. Did you have any specific questions about them that I could answer for you?

Yes, like there was a person that had "recruiter" status for example, and I have seen many others too. Just this is the most recent one that I can remember.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/nqrvVxNI-looking-to-start-a-serious-ranked-5s-team

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Miss%20Buvelle

The *Recruiter* badge was a reward in a legacy version of the RAF (Refer-a-Friend) system. If I recall correctly, this reward even pre-dates the boards we use now, and was proudly displayed in the old vBulletin forums we used back in the day.

Let me know if there are any other questions you had.
Oh okay, that answers that then. But so there aren't any other types of badges like that?
As far as I know, there is only the Recruiter Badge and the Ranked Badges for each season.
No one knows anything about this?
I don't think there are any ranks and badges, aside from Rioter and Arbiters.
